ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCMD_637103996069748458Execute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import NameValueDictionary systemName = entity.Definition.EntitySource.SystemInstanceName entityDefinition = EntityDefinition.GetByName(systemName, "FN_DOCUMENTOTRIBUTOS") parameters = NameValueDictionary() parameters.Add("DOCUMENTOHANDLE", str(entity["DOCUMENTO"].GetInt32())) function.Call(entityDefinition, "Confirmar2", parameters)

def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNDocumentoImposto
entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return
widget.View.Commands["CMD_INFORMARTERCEIROS"].Visible = FNDocumentoImposto.ExibirPageRetencaoTerceiros(entity["IMPOSTO"].GetInt32(), entity["PESSOA"].GetInt32(), entity["DOCUMENTO"].GetInt32())
